parameters.name: LaunchTemplateId
parameters.description: The IDs of launch templates. You can specify up to 100 launch template IDs. You must specify LaunchTemplateId or LaunchTemplateName to determine a launch template.

parameters.name: LaunchTemplateName
parameters.description: The names of launch templates. You can specify up to 100 launch template names.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page.

Default value: 10.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The ID of the resource group to which the launch template belongs. If you specify this parameter to query resources, up to 1,000 resources that belong to the specified resource group can be returned.

> Resources in the default resource group are displayed in the response regardless of whether you specify this parameter.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The tags of the launch template.

parameters.name: TemplateResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The IDs of launch templates. You can specify up to 100 launch template IDs. You must specify LaunchTemplateId or LaunchTemplateName to determine a launch template.

parameters.name: TemplateTag
parameters.description: The tag of the launch template.
